LightningComponentBundle.description: A configurable navigation component that mimics the Aussie Elevate design

property.name: logoIcon
property.description: Icon for the logo (Salesforce Lightning Design System icon name)

property.name: logoText
property.description: Main logo text

property.name: logoSubText
property.description: Secondary logo text

property.name: logoImage
property.description: Static resource URL for logo image (overrides logoIcon if provided)

property.name: primaryColor
property.description: Primary color for the navigation (hex color)

property.name: secondaryColor
property.description: Secondary color for the navigation (hex color)

property.name: textColor
property.description: Text color for the navigation (hex color)

property.name: backgroundGradient
property.description: Background gradient for the navigation (CSS gradient)

property.name: userName
property.description: Display name for the user

property.name: userAvatar
property.description: URL for user avatar image

property.name: showNotifications
property.description: Show notifications icon

property.name: menuItems
property.description: JSON string of menu items configuration

property.name: userMenuItems
property.description: JSON string of user menu items configuration
